text: Heart of Asia may refer to: ==Geography== *A term coined to highlight the geostrategic location of Afghanistan at the center of Asias trade and economic junction between China, Central Asia, the Middle East, and the Indian Ocean (s. Istanbul Process). *A nickname for the East Asian country of Taiwan ==Music== *"Fortress of Islam, Heart of Asia", the Afghan national anthem from 1992 to 2006 *"Heart of Asia", a 1999 remix of Merry Christmas Mr. Lawrence by Watergate ==Television== *Heart of Asia (TV channel), a Philippine TV channel, or ** GMA The Heart of Asia, a programming block
title: Heart of Asia
